data.actual_result: You can't send mentions/custom emojis at all
data.expected_result: Autocompletion would definitely be a feature request, and maybe would be too much for a simple quick reply feature. But I believe that you should at least be able to put mentions and emojis by typing them out manually
data.short_description: Cannot send mentions or custom emojis through the inline reply field
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive a push notification - Tap Reply - Try inputting a mention or a server emoji (twemojis work fine iirc)
